name: Rise of Valknut
description:
Controls: 
Shift - Sprint
R - Toggle combat mode
Left click - Attack
E - Interact with highlighted objects 

This was a weekend game jam to play with an idea, you arrive on a ship, take over villagers, build an army which will follow you around the landscape to eventually take out the castle at the end. (I didn't have time for an end state but capturing the castle is the intended end).  
Lots of ideas has come out of this which has started to develop into another project which is much bigger. 

Let me know what you think! 


Made by: 
Me (Shaun Baker/Jestersheepy)
